title: Drawing, 1987
medium: Graphite, color pencil, pastel on Strathmore paper
signed: In black ink, lower center: L Woods s. 22 Dec 97
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and Friends of Drawings and Prints Funds and through gift of Drue Heinz
description: Imaginary project: sections of a complex of multiple tower structures; annotated with numerals in rows in sky area, and other numerical annotations at bottom of image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1987.
1987. Graphite, color pencil, pastel on Strathmore paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and Friends of Drawings and Prints Funds and through gift of Drue Heinz. 1999-23-2.
